label: Scooters and Mopeds
description: Motorized and non-motorized two-wheeled vehicles for personal transportation.
intents: Find a used moped or scooter for sale.
Compare prices and financing options for mopeds and scooters.
Find information on specific scooter or moped models.
Find accessories and parts for scooters and mopeds.
Find information on scooter and moped events and communities.

subcategories.label: Gas Scooters and Mopeds
subcategories.description: Gasoline-powered scooters and mopeds for personal transportation.

subcategories.label: Stunt Scooters
subcategories.description: Scooters designed for performing tricks and stunts.

subcategories.label: Accessories and Parts
subcategories.description: Accessories and parts for scooters and mopeds.
